(Simplified: 鲊)
Chinese Definition:
①鹽醃的魚。［合］肥鮓(大而厚實的鹹魚)；鮓脯(鹽醃的魚乾)；鮓醬(鮓醢。魚醬)；鮓羹(用醃魚做的湯)。
②泛指鹽醃食品。［合］鮓甕(鹽醃食品用的陶甕)；鮓菜(鹽醃的魚肉蔬菜)。

鮓字的基本解释

鮓
zhǎ

鮓
zhà
均见“鲊”。

鮓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǎ］
［《廣韻》側下切，上馬，莊。］
“鲊1”的繁体字。
(1)用腌、糟等方法加工的鱼类食品。
(2)泛指腌制食品。
[②]［zhà］
［《集韻》助駕切，去禡，崇。］
“鲊2”的繁体字。
海蜇。

鮓字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮓； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1468第16
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?側下切。與鮺同。藏魚也。【釋名】鮓，滓也。以鹽米釀之如葅，熟而食之也。又【集韻】助駕切，音乍。海魚名。或作蚱。【博物志】東海有物，狀如凝血，從廣方員，名曰鮓魚。無頭目處所，內無藏，衆蝦附之，隨其東西，人煑食之。

[①]［zhǎ］
["Guangyun" cut side down, mounted on horse, Zhuang. ]
Traditional characters for "鲊1".
(1) Fish food processed by methods such as pickling and glutinous rice.
(2) Generally refers to preserved foods.
[②]［zhà］
["Jiyun" helps drive to cut, go to 禡, Chong. ]

jellyfish.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鲊; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1468 Page 16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Cut side down. Same as 鮺. Tibetan fish also. [Release name] Kun, Huo Ye. Stuffed with salt and rice are like ko, cooked and eaten. Also 【Jiyun】to help the driving cut, the sound is at first glance. The name of the sea fish. Or as a grasshopper. [Natural History] There is something in the East China Sea, which looks like blood clotting. It is a member of Guangfang and is called a minnow. There is no boss place, there is no hiding inside, all the prawns are attached to it, whatever it is, people will eat it.
